networks.name: Akash
networks.operatorEconomics: Providers earn lease revenue; requires uptime and infra ops

networks.name: Nosana
networks.operatorEconomics: GPU hosts earn NOS rewards/job fees; benchmark-sensitive

networks.name: Ritual
networks.supportedModelsHardware: Composable AI workflows and protocol-native compute

networks.name: Hyperbolic
networks.architecture: GPU cloud plus AI inference APIs
networks.supportedModelsHardware: Open-weight LLMs/image models and rentable GPUs
networks.operatorEconomics: Suppliers monetize idle capacity through managed orchestration

networks.name: Together AI
networks.supportedModelsHardware: Broad OSS model catalog and enterprise GPUs
networks.operatorEconomics: Managed cloud model; less direct permissionless operator rewards

networks.name: Bittensor Subnets
networks.operatorEconomics: Miners/validators earn TAO via subnet scoring and stake dynamics

networks.name: io.net
networks.operatorEconomics: Suppliers monetize idle GPUs via aggregated demand

networks.name: WSI
networks.supportedModelsHardware: Curated model set + tiered hardware profile
networks.operatorEconomics: Operators earn request revenue with performance multipliers
networks.tokenIntegration: WATT discounts, staking boosts, reputation incentives

wsiDifferentiators: Token utility tied to real inference demand
Hybrid curated fast-lane + open marketplace model
lessonsFromCompetitors: Improve DX, SDKs, and SLA communication (Together AI / Hyperbolic)
Strengthen capacity discovery and region-aware routing (Akash / io.net)
Ship observability and status metrics like managed clouds

recommendedActions: Launch operator scorecard (uptime, p95 latency, success rate, price)
Publish transparent pricing matrix with WATT discount tiers
